steps.title: Make it large enough to add detail to as you go along.
steps.content: Make it large enough to add detail to as you go along.

steps.title: Cross lines vertically and sideways like a plaid pattern inside.
steps.content: Cross lines vertically and sideways like a plaid pattern inside.

steps.title: Erase the corner of the semi-circle and draw a smaller one.
steps.content: Erase the corner of the semi-circle and draw a smaller one. Draw a black hole in the smaller shape.

steps.title: You have a perfect igloo, ideal for any Inuit!
steps.content: You have a perfect igloo, ideal for any Inuit!

steps.title: You may add any kinds of extras to make it unique then color it.
steps.content: You may add any kinds of extras to make it unique then color it.
